channel.title: 317 server Bl00d Pkz! this is my first server. works with any 317 client! =]
channel.description:
[center]..:.:.:.:.:Bl00d Pkz Open Source:.:.:.:.:..
this is my first open source... hope you like it =]
----pics---- [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/29w06e0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mzh92b.png[/img]

server source: [url=http://uppit.com/v/E5I8IUPY]http://uppit.com/v/E5I8IUPY[/url] server client: (any client will work though...) [url=http://uppit.com/v/F7ZV4VYB]http://uppit.com/v/F7ZV4VYB[/url] --- comment, flame, whatever ;) ---Credits--- me for 40% of the coding (idk thats not exact >.<) pker59872 for the guide on making kbd auto attack =] soxscape for the source Moparscape Forums for letting me post my server :S Delta for the source for soxscape which is the source i used lol =] All of the guides that helped me code this server
so yea credits to all those ppl =] really... i didn't do much of the coding... just switched some stuff around... new areas... new starter items... new commands... lol check back soon for more pics or just download and mess around on it ^^
-Sudd3n H0p3[/center]

me for 40% of the coding (idk thats not exact >.<)

Moparscape Forums for letting me post my server :S

so yea credits to all those ppl =]
really… i didn’t do much of the coding… just switched some stuff around… new areas… new starter items… new commands… lol
check back soon for more pics or just download and mess around on it ^^

-Sudd3n H0p3[/center]
